text:
When chatting w/ those who are #vaccine hesitant, it's important to employ the listen, validate & empathize approach.

In our nightly zoom sessions, we try to create  a safe & supportive environment.

🙏🏽 @jonathanstea #COVID19 #scicomm #science #ScienceTwitter #MedTwitter https://t.co/SFxt4CfXrG
